title: ConfigSourceFactory provider not found after upgrading to Quarkus 3.2.4
body:
### Describe the bug

After upgrading to Quarkus 3.2.4, using the ConfigSourceFactory from SmallRye no longer seems to work when the apicurio-registry-avro extension is present. The build is successful when changing the Quarkus version to 3.2.0 or below.

### Expected behavior

The build is successful

### Actual behavior

The build is unsuccessful and fails with the following stacktrace:

```
* Exception is:
org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskExecutionException: Execution failed for task ':quarkusGenerateCode'.
```

### How to Reproduce?

1. Clone the reproducer at https://github.com/gordonr-ca-ibm-com/quarkusio-spi-gradle-bugreport
2. ./gradlew clean build
